summary: GOING DOWN HIGHWAY GO TO ADJUST AC TEMP. AND THIS LOUD TAP TAP TAP TAP STARTS SOUNDING OFF IN DASH. SCARED ME CAUSED ME TO JUMP AND ALMOST LOSE CONTROL OF CAR.  TOOK TO CHEVROLET DEALER THEY REPLACED  BLEND DOOR ACTUATOR.  I HAVE HAD THIS REPLACED FIVE DIFFER. TIMES UNDER WARRANTY. 2015 81000 MILES AND IT GOES OUT AGAIN.  I AM NOW USE TO THE SOUND AND IT DOES NOT SCARE ME LIKE BEFORE. I HAVE TALKED TO OTHER IMPALA OWNERS AND THYE HAVE THE EXACT SAME PROBLEM. THEY SAID IT SCARED THEM TOO WHEN IT FIRST HAPPENED.
